attributes.action: Allow Muslim Children To Read Friday Prayers in Mosques
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most Muslim children met me and said that they can't read friday prayers in school because the schools don't have proper rooms, so they said that they want to read in mosques. We need 250 signs for the Prime Minister Gordon Brown and the government to accept this petition.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Allow Muslim Children To Read Friday Prayers in Mosques."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16892


Prime Minister's Office
